run.cmd: export AIRFLOW_HOME=/usr/local/airflow && export FRAMEWORK_NAME=airflow && export POSTGRES_USER=airflow && export POSTGRES_PASSWORD=deleteme && export USE_DOCKER_CONTAINER=True && export DEFAULT_DOCKER_CONTAINER_IMAGE=gregpalmermesosphere/airflow-dcos-package:1.8.0-1.0.1 && $AIRFLOW_HOME/bin/modify-airflow-cfg.sh && /usr/bin/airflow backfill tutorial -s 2015-06-01 -e 2017-06-29 && sleep 200
